name: Backpack
description: Durable backpack suitable for college students, office use, and short travel. Includes multiple compartments and padded straps.

name: Water Bottle
description: Insulated stainless steel water bottle that keeps beverages cold for up to 24 hours or hot for 12 hours.

name: Notebook
description: A5 size notebook with high-quality pages, ideal for daily notes, sketches, and journaling.

name: Laptop Sleeve
description: Protective laptop sleeve with soft padding, suitable for laptops up to 15 inches.

name: Headphones
description: Wireless over-ear headphones with active noise cancellation and long battery life.
